  • Method Details

    • addActions

      protected void addActions(@NotNull @NotNull GridMenu<net.tangly.commons.logger.EventData> menu)
      Description copied from class: ItemView
      Add custom actions to the context menu. Overwrite the menu if you want to add actions to the context menu. The mode of the view is available through the ItemView.mode()}. The read-only attribute is available through the ItemView.readonly() method. The menu can also be retrieved through the ItemView.menu() method.
      Overrides:
      addActions in class ItemView<net.tangly.commons.logger.EventData>
      Parameters:
      menu - context menu of the grid
